meanings.def: a wild plant growing where it is not wanted, especially among crops or garden plants
examples: The yard was overgrown with weeds.
Routine maintenance of the garden consists of keeping weeds under control.
There were weeds pushing up through the gravel.

meanings.def: any wild plant without flowers that grows in water and forms a green floating mass

examples: I wish I could give up the weed (= stop smoking).

meanings.def: a person with a weak character or body
with more problems, work or commitments than you can manage
examples: The bartender was alone and in the weeds, so we had to wait twenty minutes to order.

meanings.def: too concerned with the details of something
examples: I don't want to get too deep in the weeds here, but here's the short version:…

idioms.def: with more problems, work or commitments than you can manage
examples: The bartender was alone and in the weeds, so we had to wait twenty minutes to order.
I don't want to get too deep in the weeds here, but here's the short version:…

meanings.def: to take out weeds from the ground
examples: I've been weeding the flower beds.
